objects.description: [Industroyer](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0001) has a destructive wiper that \overwrites all ICS configuration files across the hard drives and all mapped network drives specifically targeting ABB PCM600 configuration files\. (Citation: Dragos Inc. June 2017)

external_references.description: Dragos Inc. 2017, June 13 Industroyer - Dragos - 201706: Analysis of the Threat to Electic Grid Operations Retrieved. 2017/09/18
